storyInfo: Victoria's dukes have begun to respond to the developments in Norbert Borough, but rescue does not seem to be their objective. At the same time, the tragedy in Norbert has begun to unfold.

attributes.content: 'We've confirmed that a high-speed warship belonging to the Duke of Windermere was attacked by an unknown Sarkaz weapon. There were no survivors.'
'Our preliminary conclusion is that the weapon in question is indeed the structure that briefly appeared in the skies over Londinium.'
'Based on frontline evaluation from the remote observation team, the weapon's powerful mid-air suspension abilities and the efficiency of its Originium Arts generator deserve due caution.'

'It is impossible to evaluate the Sarkaz's technological base for manufacturing large-scale armed aerial vehicles given the information we currently have. We are in the process of gathering more intel.'

'However, until it has been proven that the Sarkaz possess the technological means to mass-produce such weapons, we would recommend against categorizing this target at the highest threat level for the time being, as countermeasures have already been deployed.'
'It should also be noted that Norport Borough, Londinium's old logistics district, was separated from the main body of Londinium City yesterday.'
'The plate is now docked by itself between the city and the Londinium peripheral front formed by the various dukes.'

'We have reason to suspect that the Sarkaz are trying to convert this plate into a forward operating base, using it to support their slate of large-scale military operations in the foreseeable future.'
'It will likely also be used as a temporary stop for that large-scale Sarkaz weapon.'
'The current commander of the Londinium Defense Forces, Lt. Colonel Lettou, issued a statement claiming that Norport was accidentally separated from Londinium's main body due to 'technical reasons.''
'A large number of Londinium citizens still remain on the plate, and the Defense Forces are preparing to launch a 'rescue plan' for these citizens.'
'The remote observation team has provided several photos taken on the scene.'
'At the moment, we are not planning any large-scale operations against this plate.'

'However, intelligence personnel believe that a series of irregular staffing transfers between the Duke of Windermere's mobile fortress and 'Irnclad Galavae' over the last eight hours is likely related to the situation in Norport.'

'Several analysts have pointed out that the Duke of Windermere's military claims to this plate are more radical than we previously anticipated, and the specific reasons behind this warrant a more in-depth investigation.'
'We are monitoring the other dukes' attitudes and subsequent actions in response to this Sarkaz attack, and will be submitting routine analysis reports at shorter intervals.'
'Awaiting further instructions.'
...'Technical reasons'.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: How unsophisticated.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But, it gets the job done. They know full well... that we all care greatly about our own reputations. Especially in the face of Victoria's coming future.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: So, they also decided to throw out a bit of bait... Hmph. A flying fortress, huh?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: It pains me to say this, but, as long as they're holding Norport Borough at gunpoint, things are going to get messy.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Now, even Wellington doesn't have the nerve to rush over with his high-speed warship, rain fire down on the old logistics area, and snatch away his new toy.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But he won't be able to resist the temptation.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Affirmative. The Duke of Wellington's troops have sped up their advance. We suspect he's already gained intel on the airship.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: This massive airship is indeed beyond our calculations, and it has the potential to reshape future wars. But, as the intelligence says, we're far from the point of things spiraling out of control.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: According to our estimates, even if the Sarkaz had a secret channel for transporting supplies, they wouldn't have had the time or resources to build multiple airships.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Those damned devils can hardly bring out the value of this technology, but perhaps we can.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: That's right. Naturally, this is extremely important to me. Even if I don't give the order, I expect that you'll bring it to me.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: However, our gaze ought to be cast wider than just this singular piece of technology.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: What really worries me is...
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: We've let the Sarkaz run amok in the Shard for far too long. Even the most dim-witted fools will eventually figure out what lies behind those buttons and levers.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Allerdale... I don't blame her. She was never ambitious enough– that was her strong suit, and I allowed her to keep it. But, it doesn't look like there's any way to make use of our 'Stone of the Sword.'
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Rest assured, the dukes who supported you, along with their vassals, are still resolutely on your side.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: I promised them peace and safety, and I will deliver.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Forever honor one's commitments– that has always been the motto of House Caster since ancient times.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: 'Trilby Asher' is already being dealt with.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Naturally. They always have a way.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Then, Your Grace, about the citizens of Norport...
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Lt. Colonel Lettou said that he was preparing a 'rescue plan.'
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: You won't go wrong putting your trust in that Gaulish commander. I've met him before– he's an interesting man.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: The Sarkaz have never publicly claimed to 'occupy' Londinium, as it has nominally been under the control of the Defense Forces.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: And this Lieutenant Colonel has managed to survive in his position for four years without getting caught up in any major trouble either...
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: We all know how what those devils are like, so that fact alone is respectable enough.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Who knows, maybe he's more keen on becoming a 'savior' than we are.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: I see what you're saying.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Getting the right people into the right positions, and turning valued friends into truly loyal partners... is harder than we initially expected.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Old Wellington knows what I want, and I know what he wants.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Though we've never talked about these things openly, we naturally helped each other, all while keeping an extra knife sharpened for one another.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Poor thing. Windermere's been playing with the Leithanians for so long, it might be a while until she remembers how Victoria works.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Indeed, we still don't quite understand why the Duke of Windermere is so keenly interested in Norport's affairs. Does she also want that airship technology?
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Maybe she wants to add another card to her hand? She knows she's in for a rough time soon.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: With opportunity comes desire. Both are as honey, equally effective at leading people into the abyss.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: That cousin of mine failed to understand this, which is why he's been dead for twenty-six years.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: You know, he still appears in my dreams, from time to time.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Can't say I ever liked him. He was a bombastic, self-righteous boy.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: When we were young, he'd run up and down the corridors of the palace, spouting quotes from past kings he saw in some book.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: And, he'd always spew the same trite platitudes.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: 'A role model for the masses,' 'noblesse oblige,' what have you.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: He treated those words as his guiding compass, though they probably didn't even come from the kings they were attributed to. In all likelihood, they were flattering embellishments added by the royal archivists.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: He actually believed those words, and paid the price for it.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But despite all that, I sometimes still miss him.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: During those years he was still around, we could pretend that all was well.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: But now, even the dullest of men must open their eyes.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Open their eyes, and bear witness to all our ugliness, covetousness, and opportunism–
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: War has broken out, and its advent has fulfilled everyone's wishes at all.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Your Grace, this is also your chance to unite Victoria.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: Hah. Unity...
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Victoria has been trodden upon and sullied for far too long. You have the right to restore her glory.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: This war is for Victoria.
attributes.name: High-Ranking Officer

attributes.content: No, no, my child. This war is not for Victoria alone.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: 'Victoria.' How we love to speak the name of our country–
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: No. It's nothing more than a rag to cover festering abscesses when the people are in need of morality, an empty husk to exploit hope when the people are in need of dignity.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: All those farmers, laborers, soldiers, and nobles... All these who despise each other, who grope at each others' throats. Why does lumping all of them together make the great Victoria?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: When they speak of Victoria, what is it they refer to? The fields they've tilled for half a lifetime? The factories that've gorged on their blood and tears?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Collections of looted artifacts? Great halls of imported carpets? A splotch of color with a line of text on an atlas? Or, a news headline and a set of economic figures on a television set?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Or, is it the vast, glorious, and invincible empire built upon the foundations of each man's imagination?
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Let us prepare ourselves. Let us wait with bated breath.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Take a good look. Witness where this war will take us.
attributes.name: Duke of Caster

attributes.content: Good day, sir–
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Lemme guess. You wanna be strung up on that fence too, huh?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: To be honest, I don't have a lot of fun with that job. I suggest you turn around and crawl back to where you belong.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: No, please wait, good sir! I just... The others just wanted me to come talk to you...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Err, that's not what I meant... We just have a few trivial issues, so if you could show us a bit of mercy...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: When did you Victorians start taking us devils for a bunch of bleeding hearts?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: All we wanted... was to know what's going on in Norport Borough...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Nothing worth mentioning.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: What if... Look, we can still scrounge up some valuable trinkets. Surely, you've heard of Sargon's gems...? I have a number of them here...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Get lost.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: I get it, you're not interested, huh? I also have a collection of old Gaulish paintings that are said to be priceless– Oh, alright! M-Maybe I was out of line to say that. This is going to cost me my life, isn't it...?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: How about a Sankta patron firearm? I just happen to have one stashed away back home...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Interesting... You got your hands on an angel's guardian gun huh?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Oh, um, it's not mine though! It's just for safekeeping... Heavens, those angels from the Notarial Hall are going to flay me alive if they find out, but if you're interested–
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: I just happened to hear, you– Err, the Sarkaz enjoy collecting them, so...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Listen up. I prefer my angelic toys freshly looted from a pile of corpses. Now, piss off.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Sarkaz! We just want to know what's going on! This is a perfectly legitimate request!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: So many of us have been driven out of our homes and crammed into a little ghetto with no place to live, no food, and no freedom. Now, all we want is an explanation!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: Are all these houses not good enough for you? Pick a door, any door– knock on one of them, and get your sorry ass inside. What more do you want? A bathtub with a built-in back massager?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: You can't treat us like this! Where are the Defense Forces? I personally know Lettou and want to speak with him! We haven't broken any rules!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: That's enough, mister. Be careful...
attributes.name: Feline Woman

attributes.content: They're armed!
attributes.name: Feline Woman

attributes.content: Let go of me! What do I have to be careful for? Listen up, Sarkaz! I've lived here for thirty years! This is my city! This is my neighborhood!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: I know you've taken over those factories. I know you lust after Londinium's wealth, so take it. Splitting off a few factories won't put a dent in Victoria's glory.
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: But I am my own man! Not even the King can take my home!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: Tell me, why did Norport Borough drive out of Londinium overnight? What's the meaning of all these walls outside the borough?!
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: Hey... Are you trying to get yourself killed?
attributes.name: Feline Woman

attributes.content: What possessed you into thinking... that you could challenge my authority?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Wait, please, good sir! He doesn't know what he's talking about!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Urk... Nngh...
attributes.name: Angry Citizen

attributes.content: What a waste.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Listen up, you sorry worms. To tell the truth, I'd like nothing more than to slaughter each and every one of you right now. Seeing your faces makes me sick. But the boss says you lot are still useful.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: So I promised him– I'd show a little restraint.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: This is the grace I've afforded you, but know that I can take it back just as easily.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Hurry! Run! Get away from here!
attributes.name: Feline Woman

attributes.content: H-Help!
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Run, run, as fast you can, pathetic Victorians! You've had your fun already! Now, it's your time to get a taste of the life once forced onto us!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Hide in every nook and cranny, hide beneath every shadow. Rip up your morality and swallow your dignity! This is everything we Sarkaz have experienced! Now, rejoice, because it's yours too!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Call it equality. This is the kind of equality you've never known!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Explain myself? Answer your questions?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: No, this is war, you dipshits!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: Learn it! Embrace it! Just like we did for thousands of years!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Soldier

attributes.content: I... *sob*... Where am I...?
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Stop your blubbering already.
Did you think they invited you here for a picnic? You can guess where the people who weren't so willing to come ended up.
You're...
attributes.name: Timid Citizen

attributes.content: Call me Baird. You're hurt, and need your wounds dressed.
attributes.name: Baird

attributes.content: Follow me.
attributes.name: Baird
